attributes.action: find an effective way to stop mobile phone usage by the driver in moving vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since legislation was introduced making it illegal to operate a mobile phone whilst driving a motor vehicle, I have noticed no change in drivers habits. It seems to be very difficult to police and the offending drivers appear unconcerned about the risk to other road users. I would suggest that the penalty should be equivalent to drink-driving.
